import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; const BlogAdd = () => { const [user, setUser] = useState({}); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ title: "", content: "", category: "", file: null, }); useEffect(() => { const ls = localStorage.getItem("user"); setUser(JSON.parse(ls)); }, []); // const [uploading, setUploading] = useState(false); // const handleChange = (e) => { // const { name, value } = e.target.value; // setFormData((prevData) => ({ // ...prevData, // [name]: value, // })); // }; console.log(user); return (

Hi {user.username}

{/*

This information will be displayed publicly so be careful what you share.

*/}
{ setFormData({ ...user, username: e.target.value }); }} />

Write your blog content here.

or drag and drop

PNG, JPG, GIF up to 10MB

); }; export default BlogAdd; { /*
*/ }
